item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

So what I’m trying to do is make it to where you can have a +2 bonus on equipment stats. This is my bonus file: [code=java]package com.rs2hd.model;

public class Bonuses {

public static final int STRENGTH = 10, RANGE = 4;

public static final String[] BONUS_NAMES = new String[] {
	"Stab", "Slash", "Crush", "Magic", "Range", "Stab", "Slash", "Crush", "Magic", "Range", "Strength", "Prayer", "Ranged Str."
};

public static int SIZE = 13;
public static int LoadSize = 14;
private Player player;
private int[] bonuses = new int[SIZE];
public int[] weight = new int[1];

public Bonuses(Player player) {
	this.player = player;
}

public void refresh() {
	if (player.getEquipment().isWieldingKnives())
		LoadSize = 13;
	else
		LoadSize = 14;
	for(int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) {
		bonuses[i] = 0;
	}
	for(int i = 0; i < LoadSize; i++) {
		Item item = player.getEquipment().getContainer().get(i);
		if(item != null) {
			for(int j = 0; j < SIZE; j++) {
				int prestigeBonus = player.prestige*2;
				bonuses[j] += item.getDefinition().getBonus(j);
			}
		}
	}
	player.getActionSender().sendBonus();
}
public void refreshWeight() {
	try {
	double realweight = 0;
	for(int i = 0; i < 14; i++) {
		Item item = player.getEquipment().getContainer().get(i);
		if(item != null) {
			realweight += item.getDefinition().getWeightWearing();
		}
	}
	for(int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
		Item item = player.getInventory().getContainer().get(i);
		if(item != null) {
			realweight += item.getDefinition().getWeightIventory();
		}
	}
	weight[0] = (int)realweight;
	} catch(Exception e) {
		
	}
}

public int[] getBonuses() {
	return bonuses;
}

public int getBonus(int i) {
	return bonuses[i];
}

}[/code]
And what I changed was: public int prestigeBonus = player.prestige*2; public int getBonus(int i) { return bonuses[i]+prestigeBonus; }
I got no errors, but when you try to login you’d get an error loading profile. I figured this would be the file to change where the bonuses are so that it affects your hitting and stuff. If someone could help me or show me the correct file that you can edit the bonuses so that it has a multiplier of 2 for the prestige integer, that would just be awesome.
